name: TUFF QUARTZ NECKLACE
description:
The crystal necklace just got a tuff makeover .  Genuine leather cord is accented by spike beads and a quartz crystal pendant.  Quartz crystal is known to aid in the manifestation of your desires and is one of the most powerful healing stones available. Please note all crystals are one-of-a-kind, so size of pendant varies (most averaging about1 1/2 inch in length). Features include a back neck slider closure for adjustable length so you can wear long or choker style, depending on your outfit and mood. Available in BLACK/ ANTIQUE GOLD, BLACK/ GUNMETAL, and BROWN/ ANTIQUE GOLD.  To order, scroll down for these color options. 

measurements- 
-neck cord length- adjustable- approx. 26" (longest)  
-spike bead detail- 2"
-quartz crystal length-1 1/2" (approx.)

name: LAW OF ATTRACTION
description:
LAW OF ATTRACTION-
Create an abundance of all that you desire with this blend of patchouli, sandalwood, and myrrh.

This woodsy blend has a unisex appeal.



About Spellbound Sky Essential Oil Potions-

Manifest your supernatural power with these enchanted brews.    Spellbound Sky combines the spirit of magic and aromatic science to create these inspiring essential oil blends.  Each scent is formulated to attract a specific energy that you desire in order to restore balence and live your life to the fullest potential.

All potions are handmade at the Spellbound Sky Studio with the finest essential oils (organic if possible) and perfume oil extracts available. Many potions combine two or more oils that manifest the same energies, making the desired intention even more potent.

Potions come in 1/2 oz. vintage black bottle with SPELLBOUND SKY LOGO on front.  The potion name and description are printed on back.
Potion is shipped in a black box, perfect for gift giving.

name: THE SS TANK in black/ white
description:
The Spellbound Sky logo tank has finally arrived. Inspired by pyramids, meditation mandalas, and American Indian symbols, this bold graphic gives it a supergalactic twist!  This black tank with white logo takes on a bold effect.

Made of 100% fine cotton jersey, this tank features a nice loose drape perfect for the heat or for layering. This is a unisex style that is true-to-size for men, but women may prefer to order one size smaller.

Sizes available are XS, S, M, L, and XL. For ordering, please be sure to scroll down to indicate size needed.

Also available in a black/black version, please see this item listed on main page.

Please note this is a extremely limited addition run and sizes are limited so order now!

name: THE LARIAT
description:
You will never be at the end of your rope as long as your imagination creates new opportunities to explore. This lariat is inspired by all the endless possibilities within. Details include black suede and gunmetal color beads braided, twisted, and knotted into a single strand.  Gunmetal spikes add a hard edge to top off this look.  

Photographs show this item wrapped around the neck, but the versatility is infinite.  Wear draped around the neck (see other item 'the ceremony' for example) or tied in the front for a different option.  Wear as a belt or a headband for another look. It's all about the endless possibilities!

 
Please note this item is also available in-
dark brown (with antique gold beads and spikes) and sand (with antique gold beads and spikes) beads, to order scroll down for these color options. 

measurements- 
- approx. 80" end to end (including spike length)

name: THE WARRIOR
description:
Take on the world with this fearless handmade necklace .  Genuine leather is macramed onto a chain, with spike bead fringe added to get the point across.  Features back neck closure for a limited adjustable length. Black leather is accentuated by gunmetal color chain and spike beads to take the Native American Indian vibe to a darker level.  Also available in TOBACCO/ ANTIQUE GOLD combo.  To order scroll down for these color options. 

measurements- 
-neck cord length- adjustable- approx. 29" (longest) to 31" (shortest) 
-chain inset length-6" 
-spike bead length-2"
